entries.name: Fire Proof
entries: Terrados Elves are immune to fire damage.

entries.name: Desert Runner
entries: Elves receive advantage on Constitution saves to avoid fatigue and exhaustion, as well as any other ill effects from running, forced marches, starvation, thirst, and hot environments

entries.name: Fire in the Blood
entries: Elves who take fire damage and weapon damage in the same round take double damage from the fire. (this is not well known)

entries.name: Elemental Lungs
entries: Terrados Dwarves can hold their breath for a number of rounds equal to four times their Constitution score before risking drowning or suffocating. They also get their proficiency bonus on Constitution saving throws against checks to drown or suffocate.

entries.name: Hope
entries: Dwarves gain advantage on saving throws against fear and despair effects. Also, once per long rest, after a natural roll of 1 on a d20 roll, members of this race may reroll and use the second result

entries.name: Light as Air
entries: You can jump up to 30 feet in any direction without making an acrobatics check.
